activities: TrustX provides a service which enhances the security of your email and related communications. Users can require recipients of their email to authenticate themselves using their mobile phone/device before they can read your email or open attachments. Users can set how much security is required for a specific email – from a recipient simply selecting “Accept” on their phone all the way up to entering their PIN, taking a picture of their face (for facial image matching), and speaking a phrase (for voice matching).
contacttitle1: Regional Head of Customer Support Americas
